articles.title: Kim Jong Un Gives Field Guidance to Newly Built Sinchon Museum
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Gives Field Guidance to Newly Built Sinchon Museum
						
 Pyongyang, July 23 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un gave field guidance to the newly built Sinchon Museum.
					 While providing on-the-spot guidance to the museum in November last year, he advanced the task to newly build it as required by the new century.
					
					 He chose the site of the museum and energetically guided its construction on a series of occasions, ranging from its design and layout to the creation of fine art pieces, display of relics inside it, slogans and guide notes. He also entrusted its construction to the Korean People's Army standing at the outpost of the class struggle and settled all the problems arising in the project.
					
					 Enjoying a bird's-eye view of the museum impeccable in its architectural beauty, he said that the appearance of the new Sinchon Museum in the run-up to the victory day when the Korean people defeated the U.S. imperialists is a striking demonstration of the spirit of the service personnel and people of the DPRK and their indomitable will to glorify forever the history and tradition of victory, holding aloft the banner of anti-imperialist, anti-U.S. struggle under the guidance of the party.
					
					 He went round a room for the education in the revolutionary history, room dedicated to the history of the museum, the general introductory room, exhibition rooms, video room, general lecture room, bomb shelter of the former Sinchon County Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, powder magazine, the ground for having a meeting to pledge revenge and other places of the museum.
					
					 He expressed great satisfaction over the successful completion of the museum as a center for anti-imperialist and anti-U.S. education and class education.
					
					 He noted that the museum exhibited in various forms and methods the relics and data on the brutal atrocities committed by the U.S. imperialists and class enemies in Sinchon to ensure a high level of visualization and vivid expression.
					
					 He said the museum served as a center for class education and source of the will to take revenge upon the enemy and a historic place bearing witness to the U.S. imperialists' monstrous atrocities. He gave an instruction to intensify the education through the museum.
					
					 No matter how crafty the U.S. imperialists become in their moves to cover up their crimes, they can never erase the traces of massacre of Koreans left in this land, he said, adding that we should force them to pay for the blood shed by Koreans and settle accounts with them with arms without fail.
					
					 To intensify the anti-imperialist and anti-U.S. education and class education is an issue of weighty importance as it is decisive of the prospect of the revolution and the destiny of the country, he noted.
					
					 It is our duty to lay bare the cruel and cunning nature of the U.S. imperialists and settle accounts with them, he said, adding that it is reality in the world the people are taken in by the U.S. imperialists' hypocritical propaganda to paint a wrong picture of the U.S. as a guardian of peace and human rights.
					
					 He said in order to firmly defend the position of the revolution, the working class position and win the final victory in the Juche revolution it is necessary to intensify the class education among all the party members, servicepersons and people and push ahead with this work consistently and in a sustainable manner under the banner of preparing them to be vanguard fighters of the working class defending the forefront of the anti-imperialist and anti-U.S. struggle.
					
					 He highly praised the soldier-builders for successfully building the museum like a university for class education.
					
					 He had a photo taken with the officials and employees of the museum.
					
					 He was accompanied by Hwang Pyong So, Kim Ki Nam, Ri Jae Il, Kim Yo Jong and Ryom Chol Song.

articles.title: DPRK FM Meets New Thai Ambassador
articles.content:
DPRK FM Meets New Thai Ambassador
 Pyongyang, July 23 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong met and had a talk with Theerakun Niyom, new Thai ambassador to the DPRK who paid a courtesy call on him on Thursday.

articles.title: Credentials to Kim Yong Nam from Thai Ambassador
articles.content:
Credentials to Kim Yong Nam from Thai Ambassador
 Pyongyang, July 23 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Thursday received credentials from Theerakun Niyom, Thai ambassador to the DPRK, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall.

articles.title: CPRK Secretariat Demands Dismantlement of Ill-famous IS
articles.content:
CPRK Secretariat Demands Dismantlement of Ill-famous IS 
						
 Pyongyang, July 23 (KCNA) -- The Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) released information bulletin No. 1100 on Thursday as regards the recently disclosed case of the south Korean puppet Intelligence Service's (IS) illegal hacking operation that sparked off uproar at home and abroad.
					 The puppet IS has eavesdropped a lot of personal computers, smart phones, etc. by using the latest hacking program it purchased under the false name of Army Unit 5163 from a foreign enterprise in 2012, the information bulletin noted, and went on:
					
					 Opposition parties and people of various circles in south Korea are demanding a strict investigation to thoroughly probe the truth behind the case, asserting the IS might have used the hacking program not only for surveillance over civilians but also for interfering in the election of "national assemblymen" and the "presidential election" in 2012.
					
					 Much upset by this, villains of the puppet IS are claiming that they used the program mostly for their "operations and activities against the north."
					
					 The conservative group in south Korea including the "Saenuri Party" is getting zealous in shielding the IS, talking such rubbish that the hacking operation is an "urgent requirement for coping with the threat from the north" and a "duty of the intelligence organ" and "such hacking operation should be conducted if necessary."
					
					 This is another unpardonable provocation against the DPRK and a last-ditch effort of the puppet group to get rid of its pretty fix by misleading the public opinion.
					
					 Whenever hacking cases occurred in south Korea, the puppet group got hell-bent on conspiratorial and confrontation rackets against the DPRK. For instance, when the D-dos attack on the homepage of the central election committee in south Korea, the March 20 hacking case, etc. took place, they painted each case as "the north's deeds."
					
					 The puppet IS confessed this time that since it purchased the above-said hacking program for its "cyber terrorism against the north", it has eavesdropped 87 overseas computers and hand phones and most of their IP addresses are connected to the DPRK. This clearly proves that the puppet group is getting desperate in its hacking operations against the DPRK.
					
					 Park Geun Hye was behind the IS's illegal hacking operations.
					
					 With no sleight of hand can those behind the illegal operations cover up the true colors of the Park-led IS as a sinister plot-breeding base.
					
					 The IS should be dismantled at once, and chief culprits should be sternly punished by history and the nation.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Fascist Suppression under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Fascist Suppression under Fire 
						
 Pyongyang, July 23 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK Measure Council for Human Rights in South Korea Thursday made public a statement lashing out at the Park Geun Hye group for intensifying the fascist suppression of the progressive and democratic forces for reunification since ultra-right conservative Hwang Kyo An of wicked public prosecutor origin took office as puppet prime minister in June. 
					 No sooner had Hwang been appointed as puppet prime minister than a warrant of arrest was issued for the chairman of the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions who demanded elementary right to existence, opposing the wrong labor policy of the authorities, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The police stormed and searched the April 16 Solidarity, a civic organization which led the struggle for probing the truth behind the ferry Sewol disaster and 33 people related to the Teachers Union were massively indicted by  the prosecution for the mere reason that they called for education in reunification, supporting the north-south joint declarations. 
					
					 The prosecution authorities had searched the houses of leading members of the former Unified Progressive Party for three days from July 15 and confiscated personal documents and computers. The co-chairman of the All-People Measure Council for Ferry Sewol Disaster was thrown into prison after a memorial service for the victims of the ferry Sewol was labeled "illegal." 
					
					 The south Korean authorities branded the Korea Solidarity for Independent Reunification and Democracy as an "enemy-benefiting organization" for the mere reason that its assertion was "identical to the north's one" and arrested those related to the organization and kicked up a row of putting them on a want list. Moreover, they hurled human scum "defectors from the north" into an anti-DPRK reckless leaflet-scattering operation.  The puppet Intelligence Service is busy every day kicking up a confrontation racket against the DPRK, cooking up sheer lies about it. 
					
					 Justice, progress, freedom and democracy are now wantonly violated in south Korea and fascist dictatorship abusing elementary human rights reigns in south Korea due to Hwang Kyo An who plays the role of a shock brigade for enforcing Park Geun Hye's dictatorial politics, the politics of terror. 
					
					 It is the height of absurdity and shamelessness for the unprecedented human rights abusers and fascist rulers to trumpet about "human rights" issue in the DPRK. 
					
					 Park Geun Hye is enforcing a hideous tyrannical rule with Hwang Kyo An playing a major role in order to carry out her sinister scenario to completely stamp out the democratic forces for reunification and thus ensure the stability of her rule, lay a groundwork for the stay of the conservative forces in power and justify the confrontation with the DPRK. 
					
					 However, they should clearly know that their fascist repressive rule would only precipitate the people's severe punishment and miserable destruction.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Floral Basket, Congratulatory Letter from Military Attaches Corps
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Floral Basket, Congratulatory Letter from Military Attaches Corps
 Pyongyang, July 23 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket and a congratulatory letter from the military attaches corps here on the occasion of the 62nd anniversary of the victory of the Korean people in the great Fatherland Liberation War. 
					 They were handed over to Army General of the Korean People's Army Pak Yong Sik, minister of the People's Armed Forces, by Military, Naval and Air Attache of the Chinese embassy here Zhang Ping who is doyen of the military attaches corps on Thursday.

articles.title: Egyptian Delegation Here
articles.content:
Egyptian Delegation Here
						
 Pyongyang, July 23 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the General Trade Union of Agriculture, Irrigation, Land Reclamation and Fishery of Egypt led by General Secretary Samy Mohamed Rezk Rezk arrived here on Thursday.

articles.title: Okayama Prefectural Delegation for Japan-Korea Friendship Here
articles.content:
Okayama Prefectural Delegation for Japan-Korea Friendship Here
						
 Pyongyang, July 23 (KCNA) -- An Okayama Prefectural delegation  for Japan-Korea friendship led by Seisuke Mihara, representative of the Association for Promotion of Friendship between Japan and North and South Korea, arrived here Thursday.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
						
 Pyongyang, July 23 (KCNA) -- An Okayama Prefectural delegation for Japan-Korea friendship visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill Thursday on the occasion of the 62nd anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 The guests laid a floral basket before their statues and paid tribute to them.
					
					 That day, a delegation of the General Trade Union of Agriculture, Irrigation, Land Reclamation and Fishery of Egypt visited the statues of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu on Mansu Hill to pay tribute to them.

articles.title: Participants of Veterans Conference Arrive
articles.content:
Participants of Veterans Conference Arrive
 Pyongyang, July 23 (KCNA) -- Participants of the 4th National Conference of Veterans arrived here on Thursday.
					 They were greeted at Pyongyang Railway Station by Secretaries of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea Choe Ryong Hae, Choe Thae Bok, Kim Yang Gon, Kim Phyong Hae and O Su Yong and officials of the General Political Bureau of the Korean People's Army and other officials concerned.
					
					 They were warmly welcomed by Pyongyangites along the route.

articles.title: Cuban Embassy Officials Visit Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum
articles.content:
Cuban Embassy Officials Visit Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum
						
 Pyongyang, July 23 (KCNA) -- Cuban Ambassador German Hermin Ferras Alvarez and his embassy officials here visited the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum on Thursday on the occasion of the 62nd anniversary of the victory of the Korean people in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 They paid tribute to the statue of President Kim Il Sung waving back to the columns of the military parade for celebrating the victory in the war.
					
					 They placed bouquets before the sculpture "Victory" in the Monument to the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War and paid tribute to the service personnel of the heroic Korean People's Army.
					
					 Being briefed on the museum, they looked round various halls there.
					
					 The ambassador made an entry in the visitor's book.
					
					 Earlier, they visited the Fatherland Liberation War Martyrs Cemetery.

articles.title: Egyptian Ambassador to DPRK Gives Reception
articles.content:
Egyptian Ambassador to DPRK Gives Reception 
						
 Pyongyang, July 23 (KCNA) -- Egyptian Ambassador to the DPRK Iman Mostafa Abdou Ahmed gave a reception on Thursday on the occasion of the 63rd anniversary of the July 23 revolution in Egypt. 
					 Present there on invitation were Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong and other officials concerned.
					
					 The Egyptian ambassador said in a speech that the peoples of the two countries will always remember the unstinted assistant the Korean people sent to the Egyptian people during the war in October, 1973.
					
					 The friendly relations between Egypt and the DPRK based on mutual respect and cooperation are developing in various fields in conformity with the desire of the peoples of the two countries, he noted.
					
					 The DPRK has always supported the rights of the Arab people, he said, expressing the belief that the Korean people would achieve greater success in all fields under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Ri Su Yong said that the Korean people sincerely wish the government and people of Egypt big success in the work to build a powerful and stable country under the leadership of President Abdel Fattah al-Sisi.
					
					 It is the invariable stand of the DPRK government to value and steadily strengthen the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries, Ri noted, and adding: The Korean people will stand by the Egyptian people on the road of independence, peace and friendship in the future, too.

articles.title: Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Erected in Phyongsong City
articles.content:
Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Erected in Phyongsong City
						
 Pyongyang, July 23 (KCNA) -- The statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il were erected in Phyongsong City, South Phyongan Province. 
					 The statues were unveiled with due ceremony on Wednesday. 
					
					 Present at the ceremony were Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju and other senior party, state and army officials, the chief secretary of the South Phyongan Provincial Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), the chairman of the South Phyongan Provincial People's Committee, officials concerned, service personnel, labor innovators, shock brigade members, working people, youth and students in the province.
					
					 The statues were unveiled by leading officials of the party, state and army and the province. 
					
					 A floral basket whose ribbon bore the august name of Marshal Kim Jong Un was placed before the statues.
					
					 Laid before them was a floral basket in the joint name of the WPK Central Committee, the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly (SPA) of the DPRK and the DPRK Cabinet and a floral basket in the name of the people in the province.
					
					 Also placed there were floral baskets in the name of party and power organs, working people's organizations, institutions, industrial establishments, farms, universities in the province and units of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces. 
					
					 All the participants made bows to the statues. 
					
					 Kim Yong Nam, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee and president of the SPA Presidium, made an address. 
					
					 He said that the erection of the statues in the province is a noteworthy event in glorifying the revolutionary careers and feats of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He called on all officials and working people in the province to firmly defend and glorify their idea and exploits forever as befitting descendants of the President and soldiers and disciples of the leader.
					
					 The participants were briefed on the statues before looking round them.

articles.title: Revolutionary Sites Witnessing Kim Il Sung's Exploits for War Victory
articles.content:
Revolutionary Sites Witnessing Kim Il Sung's Exploits for War Victory
						
 Pyongyang, July 23 (KCNA) -- An endless stream of servicepersons, working people, youth and students is visiting the revolutionary sites associated with the exploits for war victory performed by President Kim Il Sung in the run-up to the 62nd anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War (July 27, 1953).
					 There are many historic sites in Pyongyang City and Jagang, North Phyongan, Kangwon and other provinces, which bear witness to the revolutionary activities of the President, who led the Fatherland Liberation War to victory and thus shattered the myth of the "mightiness" of the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 The historic site associated with the Fatherland Liberation War in Pyongyang is the sacred place of the great war victory where the Supreme Command was located from January Juche 40 (1951) to July Juche 42 (1953).
					
					 There are a spot where the President posed for a picture after being awarded the title of the DPRK Marshal, historic buildings including the headquarters and operation room of the supreme command and the place where he had talks with heroes of the Republic and model soldiers of the Korean People's Army (KPA) in the site.
					
					 The Kosanjin Revolutionary Site in Jagang Province was also the position of the Supreme Command in November and December 1950, where the President brought about a turning-point for the victory with his outstanding military strategy and tactics in the most arduous period of the war.
					
					 The Hyangha Revolutionary Site is a place of significance where the President called the third plenary meeting of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea in December 1950.
					
					 There are the Yuphyong Revolutionary Site and Changgol Revolutionary Site in Changsong County, North Phyongan Province.
					
					 In Kangwon Province, there are Jihyesan, Puldanggol and Sungap Revolutionary Sites conveying the revolutionary activities of the President.
					
					 Looking round the revolutionary sites, visitors are full determined to add luster to the history of invincibility, true to the leadership of Kim Jong Un, supreme commander of the KPA.

articles.title: Project for Wonsan-Mt. Kumgang ITZ Drawing International Attention
articles.content:
Project for Wonsan-Mt. Kumgang ITZ Drawing International Attention
						
 Pyongyang, July 23 (KCNA) -- The DPRK's project for developing the Wonsan-Mt. Kumgang international tourist zone (ITZ) is attracting deeper international attention as the days go by.
					 In this regard, O Ung Gil, vice-chairman of the Wonsan-Mt. Kumgang ITZ Development Committee, told KCNA:
					
					 After the briefing on investment in the tourist zone held in Mt. Kumgang in May, the number of foreign companies and investors, who are willing to take part in the project, is on the increase.
					
					 Many companies in Asian and European countries showed a disposition to cooperate with the DPRK in the fields of designing, IT, building materials, foodstuffs, passenger service and so on. Some of them have already made contracts.
					
					 Many businessmen are hoping for the briefing on investment in the Wonsan-Mt. Kumgang ITZ to be held on a larger scale.
					
					 The construction for turning the Wonsan area into a world famous tourist destination, a model of city formation is being pushed forward. And a large number of local and foreign tourists have continued to visit the Mt. Kumgang area.
					
					 It has been also expected to let tourists enjoy various forms of tourism like mountain marathon and cycling.
					
					 The DPRK government has taken a series of measures to offer such preferences as recommending favorable projects ahead of others and discounting land rent to investors, who will agree upon the terms of advance investment and deferred compensation or the method of comprehensive development of land not later than 2017.

articles.title: Sci-Tech Disseminating Room in Pyongyang Maternity Hospital
articles.content:
Sci-Tech Disseminating Room in Pyongyang Maternity Hospital
						
 Pyongyang, July 23 (KCNA) -- The Pyongyang Maternity Hospital is running its scientific and technological disseminating room to good effect.
					 In this regard, KCNA met Han Myong Gun, vice-director of the hospital.
					
					 He said:
					
					 First of all, the hospital took necessary measures to build database in conformity with the completion of the room.
					
					 There are many visual aid materials about medical science and technology and books on latest medical science in the room. Store in the database are e-books and multi-media helpful to treatment.
					
					 The room has been conducive to upgrading the abilities of doctors and making successes in the treatment of patients and scientific research. 
					
					 After its completion, many doctors have been awarded academic degrees and the hospital took the first place in different national exhibitions of medical scientific and technological successes and exhibitions of medical appliances.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams U.S. Loud-Mouthed "Missile Threat from North"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams U.S. Loud-Mouthed "Missile Threat from North"
						
 Pyongyang, July 23 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, experts who had been working on missile defense system for decades made public an analytical result that it would be impossible to intercept DPRK's missiles although THAAD was deployed in south Korea, sparking off furor.
					 The result said it would be impossible to intercept DPRK's missiles as they go along irregular orbit, adding the missiles rotate or spiral as they hit targets from the highest altitude they make and therefore it would be very difficult to take accurate hit. The result added the missile Rodong makes irregular orbit and uses even deceptive warheads, deploring the fundamental limitations THAAD has just as the U.S. missile defense system that does not discern real warheads from false ones. 
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Thursday in a commentary says by getting engaged in the losing game the U.S. seeks to get vocal about the "missile threat from the north" and thus constantly push the situation on the Korean peninsula to an extreme phase and fatten the U.S. munitions monopolies which flounder in a severe economic crisis.
					
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 Another purpose is to push forward the preparations for making a preemptive nuclear attack, no matter how high price it may pay.
					
					 The U.S. loud-mouthed "missile threat from the north" is a revelation of the symptom of delusion of persecution of criminals.

articles.title: S. Korea's False Story Will Not Work: Minju Joson
articles.content:
S. Korea's False Story Will Not Work: Minju Joson
 Pyongyang, July 23 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet authorities let their reptile media spread a false story that a chemical weapons expert of the DPRK sought refuge in Finland via Philippines, bringing with him data on test of chemical weapons on guinea pigs and that he is expected to make public them at a meeting of the European Parliament late in July.
					 Minju Joson Thursday runs a commentary in this regard: 
					
					 The chief for information of the Secretariat of the European Parliament and its spokesperson clarified there is no official meeting being planned by the European Parliament within July and the Finland government officially said it can not confirm the "refuge story of chemical weapons expert of north Korea," the commentator says, and goes on:
					
					 The south Korean authorities tarnished their own face by trying to hurt the other with the groundless story. 
					
					 The despicable behavior of the south Korean authorities who get busy launching anti-DPRK propaganda campaign with blood-shot eyes is nothing but the desperate efforts of those who are driven into a tight corner. 
					
					 It is out of question that those idiots obsessed with consciousness of confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north and ambition for "unification by absorption" cannot but spit foolish stories as they fail to properly judge how the world goes about. It is by no means accidental that Europeans opted for revealing the truth in denial of the story made by media of south Korea. 
					
					 Plots and fabrications are no longer workable. It is useless for the south Korean authorities to seek a way out in hurting the DPRK while making profound confusing of right and wrong.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Group's Thoughtless Trumpeting about "Dialogue" under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Group's Thoughtless Trumpeting about "Dialogue" under Fire
						
 Pyongyang, July 23 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet Defence Ministry recently found fault with the DPRK once again in data presented to the Defense Political Advisory Board session.
					 There the puppet military warmongers let loose damned sophism that the DPRK is likely to make a strategic provocation by availing itself of the opportunity, enumerating a host of false stories aimed to make it sound plausible.
					
					 Minju Joson Thursday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 The puppet group, which had trumpeted about "dialogue" a few days ago, thoughtlessly reviled at the DPRK before its mouth that called for "dialogue" got dry. This once again reveals the evil nature of the confrontation maniacs.
					
					 It is self-evident that in order to open the inter-Korean dialogue it is necessary to create an atmosphere for sitting face to face.
					
					 No proper dialogue and positive results for reunification can be expected even though dialogue is held with those who carry dagger in their belts.
					
					 It will be of no help but just be the wasting of time for the DPRK even though it sits at the negotiating table with confrontation maniacs who harbor hostility and hatred to the fellow countrymen.
					
					 Dialogue and confrontation can never go together. The puppet group should not trumpet about "dialogue" thoughtlessly but remove its dagger if it really wants the dialogue with the DPRK.
					
					 If the group persists in the double-dealing tactics of "dialogue" and confrontation in defiance of the warning of the DPRK, it will face final miserable ruin.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Declares Signature Campaign for Keeping Jongyojo
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Declares Signature Campaign for Keeping Jongyojo
						
 Pyongyang, July 23 (KCNA) -- The Jeju Regional Joint Measure Committee for Checking Suppression of Jongyojo held a press conference in front of the Jeju Provincial Education Agency on July 20 and declared the start of the signature campaign to keep Jongyojo, according to south Korean Yonhap News.
					 In the conference the organization said suppression of Jongyojo revealed before the world that south Korea is an undemocratic society where workers are cracked down as the suppression is a typical one violating democracy.
					
					 It stressed that it would wage a signature campaign demanding a stop to the suppression of Jongyojo.

articles.title: S. Korean Bodies Protest against Japan's Moves for Exercising "Right to Collective Self-defense"
articles.content:
S. Korean Bodies Protest against Japan's Moves for Exercising "Right to Collective Self-defense" 
						
 Pyongyang, July 23 (KCNA) -- More than 120 national organizations of south Korea including the Council for the Peaceful Unification of Tangun's Nation made public a statement on July 17 in protest against Japan's moves for exercising "right to collective self-defense". 
					 The statement accused Japan of working hard to justify war actions by reinterpreting the constitution in such a way as to enable Japan to exercise "right to collective self-defense" in disregard of the Pacifist Constitution. 
					
					 The statement went on:
					
					 Japan is becoming ever more undisguised to revive militarism, raising a strong claim to "Tok Islets," far from making sincere apology and reparation for the crimes committed against the Korean nation including sexual slavery. 
					
					 Branding the exercise of the "right to collective self-defense" as the second "Katsura-Taft Treaty" as it presupposes a war on the Korean peninsula, the statement expressed strong opposition to it. 
					
					 It also denounced the U.S. attitude of "welcoming" passage of the security bills through a session of the House of Representatives of Japan.

articles.title: Suppression of Progressive Party Officials Denounced by S. Korean Paper
articles.content:
Suppression of Progressive Party Officials Denounced by S. Korean Paper 
						
 Pyongyang, July 23 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet paper Voice of People on July 17 in an editorial denounced the south Korean prosecution authorities for searching houses of supreme members of the former Unified Progressive Party (UPP) on July 16. The party had been forcibly disbanded before. 
					 The editorial said it is nonsensical to search the houses under the pretext that they created illegal political funds. 
					
					 Noting that the rule under the pretext of security has been intensified since Hwang Kyo An took office as "prime minister", the editorial went on:
					
					 The search of the houses was made in a bid to cover up the illegal hacking case of the Intelligence Service and tide over the crisis of the authorities.

articles.title: Works of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Posted by Int'l Body on Its Website
articles.content:
Works of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Posted by Int'l Body on Its Website
						
 Pyongyang, July 23 (KCNA) -- The Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain posted President Kim Il Sung's work "Go All Out for Victory in the War" and leader Kim Jong Il's work "Socialism Is What Keeps Our People Alive" on its website on July 13.
					 The work, a radio speech made by Kim Il Sung to all the Korean people on June 26, Juche 39 (1950), deals with the efforts exerted by the DPRK government to achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea and lays bare the aim sought by the U.S. imperialists and the Syngman Rhee puppet clique in igniting the war of aggression.
					
					 The work, published by Kim Jong Il on November 14, Juche 81 (1992), deals with the necessity to defend the world socialist movement and the cause of socialism and indicates the tasks for defending and advancing the cause and ways to do so.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Exploits Introduced by Foreign Media
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Exploits Introduced by Foreign Media
 Pyongyang, July 23 (KCNA) -- Foreign media made special write-ups on the 3rd anniversary of the conferment of the title of DPRK Marshal on supreme leader Kim Jong Un and the 62nd anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 The Russian paper Bremya Peremon + TV on July 16 carried an article titled "Extraordinary commanding art" accompanied with his photo.
					
					 The paper said the international community is admiring the commanding art of Kim Jong Un who has brought about world-startling miracles in the building of a thriving nation while moving all servicepersons and people as one.
					
					 The Kuwaiti paper Al Shahid on July 17 carried an article illustrated with a photo of him waving back to the cheering servicepersons of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 The DPRK is increasing its might and reliably defending the peace and security on the Korean peninsula and in Northeast Asia under his leadership, the paper noted,
					
					 An article titled "Great Songun brilliant commander Marshal Kim Jong Un" was posted on the website of the Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany illustrated with 18 photos documenting his Songun leadership exploits on July 17.
					
					 The article said he is glorifying the history of Songun victory true to the cause of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and increasing the might of the Korean People's Army in every way with his extraordinary commanding art.

articles.title: Anniversary of Korea's Liberation to Be Celebrated in Russia
articles.content:
Anniversary of Korea's Liberation to Be Celebrated in Russia
						
 Pyongyang, July 23 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation was formed by "Jongilbong" Russia-Korea Friendship Association of Ulyanovsk Region on July 17.
					 Aleksandr Kruglikov, chairman of the association, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to significantly hold political and cultural events to praise the revolutionary careers and exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il from July 17 to August 17.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Slammed for Forcibly Detaining DPRK Residents
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Slammed for Forcibly Detaining DPRK Residents
						
 Pyongyang, July 23 (KCNA) -- German and Swiss organizations denounced the unethical act of the south Korean authorities forcibly detaining DPRK residents and demanded they repatriate the detainees to the DPRK.
					 The Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany noted in a statement on July 15 that the south Korean authorities gravely violated the human rights of the DPRK citizens who were unexpectedly adrift toward the area of the south side due to the worsening of weather condition and engine trouble, an unpardonable heinous provocation against the DPRK.
					
					 The statement demanded the south Korean authorities send them, who were being detained at the instruction of the U.S. imperialists, back to their country and families without delay.
					
					 The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea on July 16 in a joint statement urged the pro-U.S. conservative authorities of south Korea to repatriate DPRK residents.
					
					 The Park Geun Hye group, which much touted "unification" and "reunion of separated families", is violating the human rights of DPRK residents, the statement said.

articles.title: Nepali Bodies Accuse S. Korean Authorities of Detaining DPRK Residents
articles.content:
Nepali Bodies Accuse S. Korean Authorities of Detaining DPRK Residents
						
 Pyongyang, July 23 (KCNA) -- Nepali organizations made public a joint statement on July 16 in denunciation of the south Korean authorities for detaining DPRK residents. They included the Nepal-Korea Friendship Association, Afro-Asian People's Solidarity Committee, Committee for Promotion of Reunification of Korea, Journalist Association, Association for Supporting the Songun Politics, Study Forum for Self-Reliance and the Literary Forum for the Study of Songun Politics.
					 The statement said:
					
					 We, loving peace and valuing friendship with the Korean people, can hardly repress the indignation at the news that the south Korean authorities were forcibly detaining three of five DPRK residents who were adrift in the sea by accident.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should stop inhumane act against the fellow countrymen.
					
					 We strongly demand the south Korean authorities repatriate DPRK residents without delay.
					
					 We urge them not to deteriorate the north-south relations.

articles.title: First Democratic Elections in DPRK Introduced by German Body
articles.content:
First Democratic Elections in DPRK Introduced by German Body
						
 Pyongyang, July 23 (KCNA) -- The Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany posted on its website an article titled "First democratic elections in DPRK" on July 16.
					 The article said that the democratic elections with all people involved took place in the DPRK for the first time in history on November 3, 1946, one year after Korea's liberation. It went on:
					
					 The whole country was wrapped in a festive mood.
					
					 In this significant day President Kim Il Sung went to a polling station of Sub-constituency No. 52 of Constituency No. 6 in Pyongyang city and voted for a candidate from a worker.
					
					 Addressing the Pyongyang Celebration Democratic Elections on November 1, 1946 the President said that the democratic reforms enforced under active support and participation of all the Korean people drastically changed all aspects of the society and laid solid foundation for building the DPRK.
					
					 At his precious instructions, the Korean people took part in the first democratic elections and fully displayed the indomitable will to build an advanced democratic and independent state with the concerted efforts of the nation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige Museo de Sinchon
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige Museo de Sinchon 
Pyongyang, 23 de julio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un dirigio sobre el terreno el Museo de Sinchon recien construido.
					Al visitarlo en noviembre del ano pasado, el Mariscal dio la tarea de construirlo nuevamente conforme a la demanda de nuevo siglo.
					
					El fijo el solar del museo, dirigio energicamente en varias veces la obra inclusive el diseno, el plan de conformacion, la creacion de las obras de bellas artes, la exhibicion interior, las consignas y hasta la senal guia, encargo la construccion al Ejercito Popular que se encuentra al frente de la lucha clasista y resolvio todos los problemas.
					
					Presenciando el panorama del museo erguido perfectamente en lo estetico y arquitectonico, el Mariscal dijo que el Museo de Sinchon se construyo nuevamente con motivo del dia de  victoria de guerra en que el pueblo coreano vencio al imperialismo norteamericano, lo cual manifesto patentemente el impetu invencible y la voluntad indoblegable de nuestro ejercito y  pueblo para glorificar para siempre la historia y tradicion de victoria, enarbolando la bandera de la lucha  antiimperialista y antiyanqui bajo la direccion del Partido.
					
					El Mariscal recorrio la sala de educacion en la historia revolucionaria, la de presentacion del historial, la de colecciones, la de exhibicion, la de video, la de leccion combinada, el refugio antiaereo del ex Comite del Partido en el distrito Sinchon, el polvorin, el lugar del juramento de venganza y otros lugares del museo.
					
					Expreso gran satisfaccion de que el museo fue construido magnificamente como centro de la educacion antiimperialista, antiyanqui y la clasista.
					
					Fueron exhibidos en el museo con distintas formas y metodos los datos de barbaridad perpetrada en el suelo de Sinchon por los imperialistas yanquis y los enemigos clasistas, asi que aseguraron en el nivel alto la visualidad y vivacidad, dijo.
					
					Senalo que el Museo de Sinchon es el centro de la educacion clasista, la fuente de venganza y el lugar historico de denuncia a la barbaridad del imperialismo norteamericano y ordeno  fortalecer mas la educacion a traves del museo.
					
					Por mas que los yanquis maniobren astutamente para ocultar sus crimenes, nunca pueden borrar sus huellas ensangrentadas dejadas en esta tierra, dijo y continuo que debemos pagar sangre con sangre y liquidar cuenta con las fuerzas armadas en cuanto al imperialismo norteamericano. 
					
					El Mariscal subrayo que fortalecer en la actualidad la educacion antiimperialista y antiyanqui y la clasista es el problema muy importante relacionado con la perspectiva de nuestra revolucion y el destino de la patria.
					
					La realidad del mundo es que enganado por la propaganda embustera de EE.UU. considera erroneamente al imperio yanqui como defensor de la paz y los derechos humanos, dijo y continuo que nosotros mismos debemos revelar y calcular la barbaridad y la astucia del imperialismo yanqui.
					
					Para defender con firmeza la trinchera de la revolucion y la clasista y lograr la victoria final de la revolucion del Juche hay que fortalecer mas el grado de educacion clasista y impulsarla de manera invariable y permanente bajo la consigna de formar a todo el Partido, todo el ejercito y todo el pueblo como vanguardistas en defender la primera linea de la lucha antiimperialista y antiyanqui, 
					
					El Mariscal evaluo mucho los meritos de los constructores militares que levantaron el Museo de Sinchon como instituto de la educacion clasista y se fotografio con los funcionarios y empleados del museo.
					
					Le acompanaron Hwang Pyong So, Kim Ki Nam, Ri Jae Il, Kim Yo Jong y Ryom Chol Song.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam recibe cartas credenciales de embajador tailandes
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam recibe cartas credenciales de embajador tailandes
						
Pyongyang, 23 de julio (ACNC) -- Theerakun Niyom presento el dia 23 en el Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae ante Kim Yong Nam, presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, sus cartas credenciales que le acreditan como nuevo embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario del Reino de Tailandia en la RPDC.
					Tras recibirlas, Kim departio con el diplomatico.

articles.title: CRPP exige disolucion de Servicio Nacional de Inteligencia de Sur de Corea
articles.content:
CRPP exige disolucion de Servicio Nacional de Inteligencia de Sur de Corea
						
Pyongyang, 23 de julio (ACNC) -- En relacion con que ultimamente en el Sur de Corea se revelo el incidente de hacking ilegal causando el espanto del interior y exterior del pais, el secretariado del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria publico el dia 23 la informacion no.1100.
					Segun lo revelado, el Servicio Nacional de Inteligencia del Sur de Corea (SIN) compro en 2012 el programa de hacking ultramoderno de una empresa del pais extranjero con el nombre disfrazado de "unidad 5163 de las fuerzas terrestres", con lo cual ha venido observando ilegalmente las computadoras, los telefonos moviles, etc. de numerosos objetos internos y externos del pais, senala el documento y prosigue:
					
					Los partidos opositores y distintos estratos del Sur de Corea exponen que el SNI haya intervenido hasta ahora no solo en la inspeccion de civiles sino tambien en las elecciones de los parlamentarios efectuadas en 2012 y las "elecciones presidenciales" usando dicho programa y demandan categoricamente a averiguar exactamente la verdad del caso en cuestion a traves de la investigacion estricta.
					
					Muy embarazosos por ello, los compinches del SNI insistieron en que emplearon la mayor parte del programa de hacking solo para las "actividades contra el Norte".
					
					Y la banda conservadora incluyendo el "Partido Saenuri" ampara activamente el SNI disparateando que esto es "realidad severa frente a la amenaza del Norte", el uso de susodicho programa es "el trabajo merecido del organo de inteligencia" y "hay que hacer hacking si se necesita".
					
					Esto es otra provocacion intolerable contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y los ultimos esfuerzos para liberarse del aprieto desviando el foco de la situacion actual.
					
					Cada vez que ocurrieran muchos incidentes de hacking tales como el ataque D-dos contra la pagina web del comite central de administracion electoral, el ataque hacking del 20 de marzo, etc., la banda titere enganaba la opinion publica describiendolos como "conducta del Norte" y se enfrascaba en el complot y confrontacion anti-RPDC.
					
					El SNI declaro esta vez que habia adquirido el programa de hacking en aras de instalarlo en 87 computadoras y los telefonos moviles del exterior y que la mayoria de ellos usaba la direccion de IP conectada con la RPDC. El hecho muestra cuan freneticamente se dedicaba la banda titere a la campana de hacking contra la RPDC.
					
					Park Geun-hye es la autora del incidente de hacking ilegal del SNI del Sur de Corea.
					
					Aunque los delincuentes se desesperen, no pueden ocultar ni esconder la fachada intrigante y la verdad del SIN encabezado por Park.
					
					Esa maldita entidad, aparato de la dictadura fascista y nido de la confrontacion fratricida, terrorismo y complot, debe ser disuelta de inmediato y los delincuentes autores deben ser castigados duros por la historia y la nacion.

articles.title: Portavoz de entidad de DDHH condena dominacion fascista en Sudcorea
articles.content:
Portavoz de entidad de DDHH condena dominacion fascista en Sudcorea
						
Pyongyang, 23 de julio (ACNC) -- En relacion con que en el Sur de Corea se torna mas abierta la represion fascista a las fuerzas progresistas por la democracia y la reunificacion despues de que Hwang Kyo An, conservador ultraderechista y origen fiscal cruel, ocupo en junio ultimo el cargo del premier, el portavoz de la Sociedad de Medidas de DDHH en el Sur de Corea hizo publica el dia 23 una declaracion.
					Tan pronto como Hwang fue nombrado como premier titere se emitio la orden de arresto al presidente de Confederacion de Sindicatos Surcoreanos quien se opuso a la mala politica laboral del gobierno y demando ofrecer el elemental derecho a la vida y se realizaron la confiscacion y el registro sobre la entidad de ciudadanos "solidaridad 16 de abril" que estaba al frente de la lucha por averiguar los verdaderos aspectos del accidente del ferry "Sewol". Tambien, fueron acusadas a la fiscalia las 33 personas relacionadas con el Sindicato Nacional de Ensenantes quienes se dedicaban a la educacion de reunificacion apoyando las declaraciones conjuntas Norte-Sur.
					
					Y durante 3 dias desde el 15 de este mes los titeres surcoreanos  registraron a fuerza las viviendas de los ex relacionados medulares del Partido Progresista Unido y confiscaron los datos personales y ordenadores y   encarcelaron al copresidente del Consejo Pannacional de Medidas del Desastre del Ferry "Sewol" calificando el mitin de recordacion del "Sewol" como "acto ilegal".
					
					En particular, diciendo que la Solidaridad de Corea por la reunificacion independiente y la democracia "hizo la misma insistencia que el Norte" la tildaron de "entidad pro-enemiga" y arrestaron a los interesados.
					
					Y lanzaron a los fugitivos norcoreanos a lanzar los volantes de contenido anti-RPDC e hicieron que el Servicio Nacional de Inteligencia desplegara las maniobras de invencion de la erronea opinion publica sobre la RPDC. 
					
					Debido a Hwang, agente de la politica dictatorial y la de terror horroroso de Park Guen-hye, en el Sur de Corea reina la dictadura fascista que viola despiadadamente la justicia, el progreso, la libertad y la democracia y extermina hasta los derechos humanos elementales.
					
					Tales criminales de violacion de DDHH y gobernadores fascistas cuestionan los "DDHH" de alguien, lo cual es absurdidad y el climax de cinismo.
					
					Park recurre a la brutal gobernacion represiva poniendo al frente a Hwang, maldito fascista con el objetivo de asegurar la estabilidad de poder eliminando totalmente las fuerzas democraticas por la reunificacion, consolidar la base para la retoma de las fuerzas conservadoras en el poder y justificar la confrontacion anti-RPDC.
					
					Pero, deben tener presente que con la gobernacion de represion fascista obtendra solo la sentencia severa de la opinion publica y la ruina tragica.

articles.title: Levantadas en Phyongsong estatuas de bronce de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Levantadas en Phyongsong estatuas de bronce de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il 
						
Pyongyang, 23 de julio (ACNC) -- Fueron levantadas las estatuas de bronce de los grandes lideres Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il en la ciudad de Phyongsong de la provincia de Phyong-an del Sur.
					Tuvo lugar el dia 22 la ceremonia de descubrimiento de las estatuas de bronce.
					
					Participaron alli Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju y otros cuadros directivos del partido, el Estado y el ejercito, el secretario jefe del Comite del Partido del Trabajo de Corea en esa provincia, el presidente del Comite Popular de la provincia de Phyong-an del Sur, y otros funcionarios correspondientes, oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea, los benemeritos laborales, los brigadistas, los trabajadores,  jovenes y estudiantes de la provincia.
					
					Las estatuas de bronce fueron descubiertas por los cuadros directivos del partido, el Estado, el ejercito y de la provincia de Phyong-an del Sur.
					
					Ante las estatuas de bronce fue colocado un cesto de flores a nombre del Mariscal Kim Jong Un,.
					
					Tambien fueron puestos un cesto de flores en nombre comun del Comite Central del PTC, el Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema y el Consejo de Ministros de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y el otro en nombre de los habitantes de la citada provincia.
					
					Luego, fueron depositados los otros a nombre de los organismos del partido y el poder, entidades de masas, organos, empresas, fabricas, granjas y universidades a todos niveles, unidades del EPC y del ESIP, en la provincia de Phyong-an del Sur.
					
					Todos los participantes rindieron sublime homenaje a los grandes lideres.
					
					El discurso de ocasion estuvo a cargo de Kim Yong Nam, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del CC del PTC y presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la RPDC.
					
					El orador dijo que el levantamiento de las estatuas de bronce de grandes lideres en provincia es un acontecimiento de gran importancia para glorificar eternamente sus vidas revolucionarias y hazanas.
					
					Llamo a todos los funcionarios y trabajadores de la provincia a defender con firmeza y glorificar para siempre las ideas y las hazanas de los grandes lideres como descendientes de Kim Il Sung, soldados y discipulos de Kim Jong Il.
					
					Tras escuchar las explicaciones sobre las estatuas de bronce, los participantes las recorrieron.
